title: Brand new modern house in high residential area, Etulkotte
details:
Architecturally designed modern brand new luxury house for sale at Etulkotte
Spacious sitting and dinning area
Five bed rooms with attached bathrooms
Modern fitted pantry and wet kitchen area
Servant room and bathroom
Large TV lobby
Large roof terrace
Kumbuk staircase
solidly built with 9 inches walls
Mahogany hand railings
double height ceilings
A/c facility for all rooms
Four covered parking space
In High residential area
Calm and quite neighborhood
95% completed
If you wish to buy it as it is price level Rs. 45 Mn(not negotiable)
Completed house Rs.55 mn (negotiable)
